column4: how can someone tries to see my desktop by remote desktop? i had a request from an ip i didn't know
have you confiured vnc port forwarding to allow remote connections from the web?
yes i configuered those settings so no one is allowed to connect to my desktop, but when i was away from my laptop, someone tried to make a connection
that's why then, you haven't used an SSH tunnel to add security. VNC is a very unsecure protocol
